title: Optimizing control efficiency in discrete-time multi-agent systems via event-triggered containment techniques combining disturbance handling and input delay management
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Hanen Louati, Azmat Ullah Khan Niazi, Mhassen. E.E. Dalam, Waqar Ul Hassan, Khawer Hameed Khan, Mohammed Alhagyan
